required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Clinical Study to Evaluate PK, PD, and PG of Rosuvastatin in the Elderly
clinical_study.official_title: A Clinical Study to Evaluate Pharmacokinetic, Pharmacodynamic, and Pharmacogenomic Characteristics of Rosuvastatin in the Elderly After Multiple Administration of Rosuvastatin

brief_summary.textblock: A clinical study to evaluate pharmacokinetic, pharmacodynamic, and pharmacogenomic characteristics of Rosuvastatin in the elderly after multiple administration of Rosuvastatin

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic parameters (Tmax; time to reach maximum plasma concentration) of rosuvastatin
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 21 0 hour, 1 hour, 2 hour, 3 hour, 4 hour, 5 hour, 8 hour, 12 hour, 24 hour

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic parameters (Cmax; peak plasma concentration) of rosuvastatin
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 21 0 hour, 1 hour, 2 hour, 3 hour, 4 hour, 5 hour, 8 hour, 12 hour, 24 hour

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic parameters (AUC; area under the concentration-time curve) of rosuvastatin
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 21 0 hour, 1 hour, 2 hour, 3 hour, 4 hour, 5 hour, 8 hour, 12 hour, 24 hour

secondary_outcome.measure: lipid panel (low-density lipoprotein cholesterol in mg/dL)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 0 hour, Day 11 0 hour, Day 22 0 hour

secondary_outcome.measure: lipid panel (high-density lipoprotein cholesterol in mg/dL)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 0 hour, Day 11 0 hour, Day 22 0 hour
Day 1 0 hour, Day 11 0 hour, Day 22 0 hour

secondary_outcome.measure: lipid panel (Total cholesterol in units of mg/dL)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 0 hour, Day 11 0 hour, Day 22 0 hour

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy Subjects aged 65 - 85 years
- A body mass index (BMI) in the range of 18.5 kg/m2 - 27.0 kg/m2.
- Good health based on complete medical history, physical examinations, vital signs, electrocardiography (ECG), and clinical laboratory evaluations.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects who have clinically significant disease of cardiovascular, respiratory, renal, endocrinological, hematological, gastrointestinal, neurological(central nervous system), psychiatric disorders or malignant tumor
- Subject judged not eligible for study participation by investigator

overall_official.affiliation: South Korea Seoul National University Bundang Hospital
